content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) with coal fuel
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) 
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(1, -60)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) containing 73 iron ore
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56)

### Smelting Complex at position(1, 1)
Consists of following entities:
- Two stone furnaces at (1, 1) and (3, 1) with coal fuel
- Two burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5) with coal fuel
- Two wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)
- Additional wooden chest at (5.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5) with coal fuel

### Smelting Complex at position(2, 7)
Consists of following entities:
- Two stone furnaces at (2, 7) and (4, 7) with coal fuel
- Two wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)
- Three burner inserters:
  - At (2.5, 8.5) with coal fuel
  - At (3.5, 9.5) with coal fuel
  - At (4.5, 8.5) with coal fuel

### Assembly Line Complex
Multiple connected structures for automation:
- Assembly machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Assembly machine at (21.5, 15.5) for electronic circuit production
- Multiple burner inserters and chests for item movement:
  - Chest at (11.5, 14.5) containing 62 copper cables
  - Chest at (21.5, 11.5) containing 15 iron plates and 90 copper cables
  - Chest at (24.5, 15.5) containing 4 electronic circuits
- Connected by multiple belt groups for material transport

### Power Generation Complex
Currently incomplete/non-functional power system:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5) producing water
- Two offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (18, 47.5) with coal fuel
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting these components
- Electric pole network (currently without power)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert coal without having it
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into machines
- Check your inventory contents before executing insert operations

### Entity Connection Issues
- Ensure fluid-carrying entities (pipes, offshore pumps) are properly connected to form complete systems
- Power generating entities need to form complete chains (water source → boiler → steam engine → electric pole)

### Power Network Issues
- Assembling machines and labs require power to function
- Ensure power generation chain is complete and properly connected
- Connect electric poles to both power source and consumers

### Resource Flow Issues
- Multiple entities show "waiting for source items" - ensure proper item supply chains
- Check that inserters have proper pickup and drop-off positions configured
- Verify belt systems are properly connected to move items between processes
